name: Zombie's taking over your home
description:
Title: Zombie's taking over your home

Platform: HTML

Genre: Narrative

Rating: PG

Target Market: Ages 13+, creative gamers

  Game Overview: A zombie apocalypse has happened and you just woke up from a nap. You must decide what to do and there are many different options and you must do everything possible to stay alive. 

Game Design Team: Spencer McGeachie
